items.title: Kevin Federline has held off writing about Britney Spears. Until now
items.summary: The ex-husband of Britney Spears makes a number of allegations against her - and she has accused him of attacking him.

If you’re trying to keep a kitchen cabinet organized, random things like a roll of trash bags can throw off the whole vibe. That’s precisely where this organizer can come in handy. It slots right onto a shelf and gives you roughly 10.5 by 8.5 by 3.5 inches of space.

items.summary:
We caught a glimpse of Best Buy teasing an upcoming Doorbuster sale event that starts on October 31, but it has now announced details on its entire holiday scheduling leading right up to Black Friday. We are talking weekly doorbuster sale events for the entire month here and a super early start to the official Best Buy Black Friday sale. We have all of the details for you below.

items.title: Jackery launches Explorer 600 v2 640Wh LFP power station and a solar bundle starting from $380 (Reg. $500+)
items.summary:
Jackery has launched the next of its second-generation remodels, with the Explorer 600 v2 Portable Power Station at $379.99 shipped. This all-new unit will carry a full price of $500 once these initial savings die down, with no sign of its availability on Amazon yet. The deal here gives you a 24% markdown off its full rate, cutting $120 off the tag and setting the bar for future discounts in coming months. Alongside the solo station option, you can also pick up the station with a 100W portable solar panel for $579.99 shipped, down from $699.

items.title: An eye implant and smart glasses restore some lost vision
items.summary: Several dozen patients regained some of their vision thanks to an implant inside their eye paired with a set of smart glasses. The study was published Monday in The New England Journal of Medicine, and researchers report that patients could see well enough using the technology to fill out crossword puzzles and read regular books […]

tomtoc 40L 17.3-inch Laptop Travel Backpack

Whenever I need to board a plane, I strive to never need to take more than one bag. That’s precisely why I picked up an almost identical bag to this one earlier this year. Unlike a lot of backpacks, this offering sports a duffle-like storage compartment, which is really nice for hauling clothes and the like. Around back you’ll find room for an up to 17.3-inch laptop and more.

items.title: You can land a Samsung Galaxy Watch for $99 at Walmart today (Orig. $200)
items.summary:
Update: This Walmart Prime Day competitor deal has returned again at Walmart – this time on all three colors of the Galaxy Watch FE Bluetooth model. Details below in the original post.

Walmart’s major fall sale is now full swing for Walmart+ members – it will open up to everyone at midnight ET. The national retailer is taking on fall Prime Day, just as expected, and it is now offering a deep discount on Samsung’s Galaxy Watch FE. If you’re not looking to pay the premium for the new Galaxy Watch 8, the more affordable FE is a solid option for casual users and it is now at least 50% off – deals start from $99.99 shipped.

Apple Watch Series 11 arrived last month, and while there are still some launch deals live at Amazon, we are yet to see any major discounts. items.title: Doc: Google launched a Trusted Tester program that will select 15 of its "Superfans" to test unreleased Pixels, using protective cases to disguise the hardware (Chris Welch/Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Chris Welch / Bloomberg:
Doc: Google launched a Trusted Tester program that will select 15 of its “Superfans” to test unreleased Pixels, using protective cases to disguise the hardware  —  Alphabet Inc.'s Google plans to let Pixel smartphone enthusiasts test out the company's next handset ahead of its public introduction.

items.title: U.S. and Australia sign $3B critical minerals deal
items.summary: Leaders of the country's governments announced they would work together to secure critical minerals supplies outside of Chinese control. The deal includes a new gallium refinery in Western Australia.

items.summary: Before Monday, Hamas had handed over all living hostages and 12 out of 28 deceased hostages under a ceasefire.

items.title: Meta AI’s app downloads and daily users spiked after launch of ‘Vibes’ AI video feed
items.summary: New data from Similarweb shows Meta AI’s mobile app is surging in popularity, jumping from 775,000 to 2.7 million daily active users in just four weeks. The app is now seeing roughly 300,000 new installs per day — up from under 200,000 previously.

items.title: French police may nab Louvre thieves but unlikely to recover their loot
items.summary: PARIS (Reuters) -Crime gangs around Europe are increasingly robbing valuable jewels and gold from cash-needy museums like the Louvre, but while law enforcement often catches the thieves, they struggle to recover the priceless goods, police and art experts say. Read full story

items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Dyson is bringing back Prime Day rates on its Airwrap Origin Multi-Styler for $399.99 shipped. Coming down from its usual $550 tag, we saw this handy styling device drop to this same rate two weeks ago during Prime Day, with only three previous discounts having been seen before that – going as low as $375 in July. You’re looking at a second chance at the second-best price we have tracked here, if you missed it two weeks ago, giving you a 27% markdown of $150 cut from the going rate. You can also currently find the more comprehensive Airwrap i.d. multi-styler for curly to coily hair with a $100 discount to $549.99 shipped.

items.title: FTC removes Lina Khan-era posts about AI risks and open source
items.summary: One post, authored by Khan’s staff, was published on January 3, 2025 with the title “AI and the Risk of Consumer Harm.” It  noted that the FTC was “taking note of AI’s potential for real-world instances of harm – from incentivizing commercial surveillance to enabling fraud and impersonation to perpetuating illegal discrimination.”

items.title: Costco now offering $50 off M5 iPad Pro pre-orders
items.summary:
As of right now Best Buy’s paid Plus and Total membership, outside of trade-in opportunities, is really the only game in town when it comes to scoring a straight cash deal on the new M5 iPad Pro. We have already detailed the Best Buy option, but as expected, Costco has now joined the party, offering its members straight $50 price drops on every single M5 iPad Pro configuration during the pre-order phase (and likely even after that).

Sharon Goldman / Fortune:
LangChain, whose open-source framework connects AI apps to real-time data, raised a $125M Series B led by IVP at a $1.25B valuation  —  LangChain, one of the earliest breakout startups of the generative AI era, announced a $125 million Series B funding round on Monday at a $1.25 billion valuation.

items.title: Keep weeds tamed and lines clean with Worx’s GT3.0 20V 12-inch cordless string trimmer/edger at $75 (Reg. up to $130)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Worx GT3.0 20V 12-inch Cordless PowerShare String Trimmer/Edger with 2.0Ah battery at $74.99 shipped. While it carries a $130 MSRP, we’ve been seeing it keep down at $119 over the year, with it recently holding lower at $79 since late August, and some occasional drops as low as $70. We saw that low price back at the top of September, with today’s deal landing just $5 higher, giving you the second-best price we have tracked, which even beats out its Prime Day pricing from two weeks ago. You’ll also find this tool coming with two 2.0Ah batteries for $110, if you want extended runtimes.

more…

items.title: Automattic CEO calls Tumblr his ‘biggest failure’ so far
items.summary: At WordCamp Canada 2025, Automattic CEO Matt Mullenweg called Tumblr his “biggest failure,” noting the challenge of maintaining the platform’s half-billion blogs while it remains unprofitable. Though plans to migrate Tumblr to WordPress infrastructure are on hold, Mullenweg said he hasn’t given up.

items.title: EcoFlow 48-hour flash sale drops expanded DELTA 2 bundle with 2x 110W solar panels to $919 low, more from $129
items.summary:
As part of EcoFlow’s ongoing Halloween Sale, you can find the next of the event’s 48-hour flash sales live, with up to 68% discounts on four different offers. Among them, we spotted the DELTA 2 Portable Power Station getting an extra battery and two 110W solar panels at $919 shipped, which is not available as a bundle on Amazon. Carrying a $2,646 MSRP, we’ve seen the costs previously taken lowest to $939 during the brand’s Prime Day Sale event that ended last week. Through October 21, however, you can pick up this solar-capable bundle with even more savings – $1,727 off the MSRP – while this flash offer lasts, giving you the best price we have tracked to date.

items.title: OpenEvidence, the ChatGPT for doctors, raises $200M at $6B valuation
items.summary: Trained on medical journals like JAMA and the New England Journal of Medicine, the platform helps users quickly get answers to existing medical knowledge to help treat patients. Verified medical professionals can access OpenEvidence’s tool, which is supported by advertising, for free.

items.title: Thailand, Cambodia to hold JBC talks to boost border cooperation
items.summary: BANGKOK: Thailand and Cambodia will hold a two-day special session of their Joint Boundary Commission (JBC) in Chanthaburi province in eastern Thailand from Tuesday (Oct 21) to address border tensions and enhance cooperation on boundary demarcation and security. Read full story

items.title: Last-minute ticket deal for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: Save 60% on your plus-one

items.title: F1 in Texas: Well, now the championship is exciting again
items.summary: The Circuit of the Americas was packed for the US Grand Prix.

items.title: Romanian court rejects plan to raise judges' retirement age
items.summary: BUCHAREST (Reuters) -Romania's top court struck down on Monday a government plan to raise the retirement age for judges and prosecutors and cap their pensions, raising questions over the ruling coalition's stability as it tries to curb the EU's biggest budget deficit.  Read full story

items.title: Colombia recalls US ambassador after Trump's tariff threat, drug remarks
items.summary: BOGOTA (Reuters) -Colombia said on Monday it has recalled its ambassador from Washington after U.S. President Donald Trump said he would raise tariffs on the South American nation and stop all payments to it, intensifying a feud stemming from U.S. military strikes on vessels allegedly transporting drugs. Read full story

items.title: Protests in Armenia's second-biggest city as mayor detained for bribery
items.summary: TBILISI (Reuters) -Police arrested the mayor of Armenia's second-largest city on bribery charges on Monday, hauling him out of his office while crowds protested outside, as authorities crack down on government critics before an election next year. Read full story

items.title: Fireworks blast victim transferred to Penang Hospital, five others still in Kulim Hospital red zone
items.summary: KULIM: A victim who suffered serious injuries in a fireworks explosion in Paya Besar near here has been transferred to Penang Hospital, while five others are still being treated in the red zone of Kulim Hospital. Read full story

items.title: Final countdown: Only 7 days until TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 and ticket prices increase
items.summary: Seven days until TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 officially kicks off at San Francisco’s Moscone West and ticket prices increase. Save up to $444 now, and get 60% off a second ticket.

items.title: X to launch marketplace for buying inactive handles

items.title: Anti-vaccine activists want to go nationwide after Idaho law passes
items.summary: The Idaho Medical Freedom Act makes it illegal to require anyone to take a vaccine.

items.title: Adobe launches AI Foundry, a program that helps enterprise customers create bespoke, commercially safe, Firefly-based generative AI models trained on their IP (Webb Wright/ZDNET)
items.summary:
Webb Wright / ZDNET:
Adobe launches AI Foundry, a program that helps enterprise customers create bespoke, commercially safe, Firefly-based generative AI models trained on their IP  —  ZDNET's key takeaways  — Adobe assures its new AI model service is copyright-safe.  — Foundry models leverage Firefly and are trained on brands' IP.
